forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
